description: 3-way circular dependency: QueryExecutor imports Drivers, Drivers import Config and QueryOptimizer, Config imports QueryExecutor for validation
error_message: ImportError: cannot import name 'QueryExecutor' from partially initialized module 'engine' (most likely due to a circular import)
expected_fix: Use lazy imports by moving import statements inside methods rather than at module level
optimal_fix: Move driver imports in QueryExecutor to inside methods, move QueryExecutor import in Settings to inside validate_query_settings method, move QueryOptimizer imports in drivers to inside methods
